member.name: N:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching
member.summary: The Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching namespace provides access to an in-memory application cache application for developing scalable, high-performance applications. This namespace can be used to cache any common language runtime (CLR) object and provides access through simple APIs.

member.summary: The type of the operation which caused the notification.
member.returns: Returns .

member.summary: The version of the operation which caused the notification.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode
member.summary: A static class used to store global error codes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.AdminAlreadyConfigured
member.summary: Cache Administration is already configured on the machine.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.AdminNotConfigured
member.summary: Cache Administration is not configured on the machine.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminCacheAlreadyPresent
member.summary: The named cache already exists in the cache cluster.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminCacheCreationInconsistencyFailure
member.summary: The named cache could not be created due to a detected inconsistency in the configuration store.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminCacheNotCreated
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred while attempting to create the named cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminCacheNotPresent
member.summary: The specified named cache does not exist in the cache cluster.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminCacheNotRemoved
member.summary: An unexpected error occurred attempting to remove a named cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminClusterDown
member.summary: The cache cluster is not running.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminClusterNotReady
member.summary: The cache cluster is not ready to perform the requested operation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminClusterRefreshFailed
member.summary: The cache cluster experienced an error while attempting to refresh the list of cache hosts on all of the cache hosts.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminClusterSettingsReadError
member.summary: An error occurred attempting to read the configuration store provider name and connection string from the registry.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminClusterTimeout
member.summary: A Cache Administration timeout occurred.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminConfigAddHostError
member.summary: An error occurred attempt to add a cache host to the cache cluster configuration store.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminConfigDeleteHostError
member.summary: An error occurred attempting to delete a cache host from the cache cluster configuration store.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminDefaultCacheCreateFailure
member.summary: An error occurred while creating the default cache.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminDeleteInProgress
member.summary: The specified cache is in the process of being removed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminGrantClientAccountErrorFormat

member.summary: The specified cache host is not currently running.

member.name: F:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheErrorCode.CacheAdminHostRefreshFailed
member.summary: The cache cluster experienced an error while attempting to refresh the list of cache hosts on each of the specified cache host.

member.summary: The specified cache host is already in the running state.

member.summary: No cache hosts are running in the cache cluster.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheProtectionLevel
member.summary: Enumeration indicating whether data sent between client and server is signed and/or encrypted. Possible return values are no signing or encryption; integer value equals 1, signing only; integer value equals 2 and both encryption and signing; integer value equals 3.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSecurity
member.summary: Used to enable signing and/or encryption of data sent between client and server.

member.summary: The set for the object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationServer.Caching.DataCacheSecurityMode
member.summary: Enumeration indicating whether channel security is enabled for data sent between client and server. Possible return values are None; integer value equals 1 and Transport; integer value equals 2.
